faq.question: Do I need an account to shop online?
faq.answer:
Yes, an account is required to place an online order. If you do not already have an account, creating one is simple! 
 1. Click Here to Register for an Account 
 2. Enter your email address and select "Submit." 
 3. Check your email inbox for your registration email 
 4. Follow the steps in your email to create your More Reward ID account

faq.question: What should I do if my payment fails?
faq.answer: If your payment fails, you can use the (COD) payment option, if available on that order. If your payment is debited from your account after a payment failure, it will be credited back within 7-10 days.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: You can now cancel an order when it is in packed/shipped status. Any amount paid will be credited into the same payment mode using which the payment was made

faq.question: How do I check order delivery status ?
faq.answer: Please tap on “My Account” section under main menu to check your order status.

faq.question: Is there a minimum order value to place my order?
faq.answer: Yes, there is a minimum order value of $40.

faq.question: How do I apply a coupon on my order?
faq.answer: You can apply a coupon on cart page before order placement. The complete list of your unused and valid coupons will be available under “My Coupons” tab of App/Website/M-site.
